name: The Return (alpyalti, defeatkhor, Nullmike, Tuku, Divine Golem, elm4gnifico)
name_original: The Return (alpyalti, defeatkhor, Nullmike, Tuku, Divine Golem, elm4gnifico)
description:
“Embark on a journey where mother nature awaits “The Run” to arrive at their roots”

How To Play?
Mouse Cursor - Move your mouse and lead the "The Run"

Credits
Game Development: Mykhailo Stavrovskyi, Euna Islam
Art & Animation: Kadir Alp Yaltı, Sarthak Chandra Gautam
Level Design: Ahmed Pasha Faisal
Audio & Narrative Design: Nail Türkoğlu
